statements: SELECT * FROM telehealth_security;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM telehealth_security WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT address, phone_number FROM telehealth_security WHERE security_level >= 2;
SELECT patient_id, medical_history FROM telehealth_security WHERE security_level = 3 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth, security_level FROM telehealth_security WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT * FROM telehealth_security WHERE security_level > 3;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM telehealth_security WHERE security_level = 5 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT address FROM telehealth_security WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1999-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, phone_number FROM telehealth_security WHERE security_level < 3 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM telehealth_security WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, patient_name FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_controls WHERE role='Admin' ORDER BY access_level ASC;
SELECT control_id, role, access_level FROM access_controls;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth > '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN access_controls ON patients.patient_id = access_controls.control_id WHERE access_level = 3;
SELECT diagnosis, patient_name FROM patients WHERE patient_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_email, patient_dob FROM patients;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_gender FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_address FROM patients WHERE patient_dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC;

SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, appointment_date FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id JOIN doctors ON doctors.doctor_id = appointments.doctor_id WHERE patients.patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, specialty FROM Doctors ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';

SELECT first_name, last_name, record_date, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' AND phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT d.doctor_id, d.first_name, d.last_name, r.diagnosis, r.treatment_plan FROM Doctors d JOIN MedicalRecords r ON d.doctor_id = r.patient_id ORDER BY d.last_name ASC, r.record_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, name, contact_number FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, status FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1999-12-31';
SELECT name, contact_number FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Avenue%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT doctor_id, name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE hospital_id = 1 AND specialization = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, status FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
